INFORMATION ON MEASUREMENTS, SAMPLING, AND VOUCHERS


Below we present, for each studied species, leaf traits measured, total number of samples, and vouchers. All vouchers are given as barcodes for specimens deposited at the Jardim Bot√¢nico do Rio de Janeiro herbarium (RB).



## Inga Vera Willd. ##

LEAF TRAITS MEASURED: rachis length; rachis expansion width; blade length; blade width

TOTAL NUMBER OF SAMPLES (ONE LEAF PER VOUCHER): 110
